helpTipsStrings.Slide0.body.translation: Cozmo likes a clean, open table in a well lit room. He sees best indoors and out of direct sunlight.

helpTipsStrings.Slide1.body.translation: Cozmo likes to be around his Cubes. They work best when he can see the symbol clearly, and they're right side up. Check out SETTINGS for Cube maintenance.

helpTipsStrings.Slide2.title.translation:
When you're not playing a game,
the Cube lights can tell you that:

helpTipsStrings.Slide2.subtitle2.translation:
Cozmo wants to
use this Cube.

helpTipsStrings.Slide2.subtitle3.translation:
This Cube is low
on batteries

helpTipsStrings.Slide3.body.translation: Each day you fill Cozmo's Play Need, you earn a Play Token. Play Tokens unlock Bonus Boxes, filled with rewards like Sparks, Games, and Tricks.

helpTipsStrings.Slide5.body.translation: Launch the Cozmo App to check in each day to keep Cozmo happy. When you fill his Play Need daily, you help him learn and grow by earning Bonus Boxes. Connect to Cozmo to wake him up and give him the attention he needs.

helpTipsStrings.Slide6.body.translation: Cozmo needs you to keep him safe, just like a small pet. Keep an eye on him in case he gets into trouble; he may need your help to get unstuck.

helpTipsStrings.Slide7.title.translation: Cozmo's backpack lights can tell you that:

helpTipsStrings.Slide8.body.translation: Cozmo and his camera are safe and secure. No images or video are ever stored, online or offline. Cozmo will only talk to devices you authorize.

helpTipsStrings.Slide9.body.translation: Cozmo needs his charger, so keep it with you. When you're done playing, place him on his charger to put him to sleep.
